scenario.sendRequestSIP:
INVITE sip:[InviteeName]@[Domain] SIP/2.0 Call-ID: [NewCallID] CSeq: [NewCseq] INVITE From: "[InviterName]" <sip:[InviterName]@[Domain]>;tag=[localTag] To: "[InviteeName]" <sip:[InviteeName]@[Domain]> Via: SIP/2.0/UDP [Adresse-TesterCSCF];branch=z9hG4bK[newBranchId] Max-Forwards: [MaxForwardsDefaultValue] Route: <sip:[Adresse-TestedCSCF];lr>,<sip:[Adresse-ServerCSCF];lr> Contact: "[InviterName]" <sip:[InviterName]@[Domain]> P-Preferred-Identity: "[InviterName]" <sip:[InviterName]@[Domain]> Privacy: none Content-Type: application/sdp User-Agent: [UserAgent]
v=0 o=[clientName] 999 999 IN IP4 [LocalAddressUAC] s=- c=IN IP4 [LocalAddressUAC] t=0 0 m=audio 45200 RTP/AVP 97 a=rtpmap:97 amr/8000/1 a=fmtp:97 mode-set=1;octet-align=1;crc=0 a=+g.poc.talkburst a=maxptime:200 a=ptime:200 m=application 25463 udp TBCP a=fmtp:TBCP queuing=0;tb_priority=1;timestamp=0

ACK [Request-URI] SIP/2.0 To: [To] From: [From] Call-ID: [CallId] CSeq: [lastCseqNumber] ACK Via: SIP/2.0/UDP [Adresse-TesterCSCF];branch=z9hG4bK[newBranchId] Contact: "[InviterName]" <sip:[InviterName]@[Domain]> Route: <sip:[Adresse-TestedCSCF];lr>,<sip:[Adresse-ServerCSCF];lr> Max-Forwards: [MaxForwardsDefaultValue] P-Access-Network-Info: 3GPP-UTRAN-TDD; utran-cell-id-3gpp=00000000 User-Agent: [UserAgent] Allow: INVITE, ACK, CANCEL, BYE, NOTIFY Content-Length: 0
scenario.sendResponseSIP: SIP/2.0 200 OK To: [To] From: [From] Via: [Via] Call-ID: [CallId] CSeq: [CSeq] Contact: [Contact] P-Access-Network-Info: 3GPP-UTRAN-TDD; utran-cell-id-3gpp=00000000 Max-Forwards: [MaxForwards] User-Agent: [UserAgent] Max-Forwards: [MaxForwardsDefaultValue] Content-Length: 0
scenario.sendRequestSIP: BYE [Request-URI] SIP/2.0 To: [To] From: [From] Call-ID: [CallId] CSeq: [newCseqNumber] BYE Route: <sip:[Adresse-TestedCSCF];lr>,<sip:[Adresse-ServerCSCF];lr> Contact: "[InviterName]"<sip:[InviterName]@[Domain]> Via: SIP/2.0/UDP [Adresse-TesterCSCF];branch=z9hG4bK[newBranchId] User-Agent: [UserAgent] Max-Forwards: [MaxForwardsDefaultValue] Content-Length: 0
